020package org.elasticsearch.env;
021
022import org.elasticsearch.common.io.Streams;
023import org.elasticsearch.common.settings.Settings;
024
025import java.io.File;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.io.InputStreamReader;
028import java.net.MalformedURLException;
029import java.net.URL;
030
031import static org.elasticsearch.common.Strings.cleanPath;
032import static org.elasticsearch.common.settings.ImmutableSettings.Builder.EMPTY_SETTINGS;
033
034/**
035 * The environment of where things exists.
036 */
037public class ClientEnvironment {
038
039    protected final Settings settings;
040
041    protected final File homeFile;
042
043    protected final File workFile;
044
045    protected final File configFile;
046
047    protected final File pluginsFile;
048
049    protected final File logsFile;
050
051    public ClientEnvironment() {
052        this(EMPTY_SETTINGS);
053    }
054
055    public ClientEnvironment(Settings settings) {
056        this.settings = settings;
057        if (settings.get("path.home") != null) {
058            homeFile = new File(cleanPath(settings.get("path.home")));
059        } else {
060            homeFile = new File(System.getProperty("user.dir"));
061        }
062
063        if (settings.get("path.conf") != null) {
064            configFile = new File(cleanPath(settings.get("path.conf")));
065        } else {
066            configFile = new File(homeFile, "config");
067        }
068
069        if (settings.get("path.plugins") != null) {
070            pluginsFile = new File(cleanPath(settings.get("path.plugins")));
071        } else {
072            pluginsFile = new File(homeFile, "plugins");
073        }
074
075        if (settings.get("path.work") != null) {
076            workFile = new File(cleanPath(settings.get("path.work")));
077        } else {
078            workFile = new File(homeFile, "work");
079        }
080
081        if (settings.get("path.logs") != null) {
082            logsFile = new File(cleanPath(settings.get("path.logs")));
083        } else {
084            logsFile = new File(homeFile, "logs");
085        }
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * The settings used to build this environment.
090     */
091    public Settings settings() {
092        return this.settings;
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * The home of the installation.
097     */
098    public File homeFile() {
099        return homeFile;
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * The work location.
104     */
105    public File workFile() {
106        return workFile;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * The config location.
111     */
112    public File configFile() {
113        return configFile;
114    }
115
116    public File pluginsFile() {
117        return pluginsFile;
118    }
119
120    public File logsFile() {
121        return logsFile;
122    }
123
124    public String resolveConfigAndLoadToString(String path) throws FailedToResolveConfigException, IOException {
125        return Streams.copyToString(new InputStreamReader(resolveConfig(path).openStream(), "UTF-8"));
126    }
127
128    public URL resolveConfig(String path) throws FailedToResolveConfigException {
129        String origPath = path;
130        // first, try it as a path on the file system
131        File f1 = new File(path);
132        if (f1.exists()) {
133            try {
134                return f1.toURI().toURL();
135            } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
136                throw new FailedToResolveConfigException("Failed to resolve path [" + f1 + "]", e);
137            }
138        }
139        if (path.startsWith("/")) {
140            path = path.substring(1);
141        }
142        // next, try it relative to the config location
143        File f2 = new File(configFile, path);
144        if (f2.exists()) {
145            try {
146                return f2.toURI().toURL();
147            } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
148                throw new FailedToResolveConfigException("Failed to resolve path [" + f2 + "]", e);
149            }
150        }
151        // try and load it from the classpath directly
152        URL resource = settings.getClassLoader().getResource(path);
153        if (resource != null) {
154            return resource;
155        }
156        // try and load it from the classpath with config/ prefix
157        if (!path.startsWith("config/")) {
158            resource = settings.getClassLoader().getResource("config/" + path);
159            if (resource != null) {
160                return resource;
161            }
162        }
163        throw new FailedToResolveConfigException("Failed to resolve config path [" + origPath + "], tried file path [" + f1 + "], path file [" + f2 + "], and classpath");
164    }
165}
